name: FFXIV ConsoleGamesWiki Dark Theme
description:
An enhancement of FFXIV.consolegameswiki Zenburn theme from Dr.Meat.

Includes:
- Themed scrollbar
- Consistent theme colors over all components
- Regular updates for fixes

All credit to Dr.Meat for the original concept.
additional_info:
[21/08/2021] 
- Fixed missing style for beatmen tribe quest navigation

[20/08/2021] 
- Styled header and content boxes for several non-styled components
- Styled scrollbar
